issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Implement ScalarAsStatisctics for non-primitive types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7079](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7079). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Statistics are not extracted for the following (parquet) types

- BYTE_ARRAY
- FLBA
- Any logical timestamps/dates
